CustomField.description: If checked, the Account can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.formula: OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = "SE_Account",RecordType.DeveloperName = "FI_Account") && ( ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Onboarding") || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Active") || ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c, "Terminated") ) && (NOT( Mark_for_Testing_Training__c )) && Backend_ID__c <> NULL
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Account can be transferred by the JustOn Connector.
CustomField.label: Connector: Upsertable
